channel.title: Posts on Bestend
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Bestend

item.title: Introduction to FastAPI Bootstrap
item.description: FastAPI Bootstrap is a production-ready toolkit that adds essential features to your FastAPI applications, including smart logging, standardized exception handling, and request tracing.

item.title: Introduction to s3lync
item.description: s3lync is a Pythonic library that bridges the gap between AWS S3 and your local filesystem, allowing you to work with S3 objects as if they were local files.

item.title: Introduction to Confee
item.description:
Confee is a type-safe configuration management library for Python applications.

Why Confee?

Configuration management in Python can be challenging:
